summary.para: Specifies the buffering requirements of a file.

remarks.para: This structure describes the buffering requirements for content encoded at the bit rate specified in the dwBitrate. The msBufferWindow member indicates how much data should be buffered before starting playback. The size of the buffer in bytes is msBufferWinow×dwBitrate / 8000.

summary.para: Bit rate, in bits per second.
Size of the buffer window, in milliseconds.
